motion_title: Novel: Shift the Conclave’s approach from passive regulat...

classification.motion_title: Novel: Shift the Conclave’s approach from passive regulat...
classification.classification_reasoning: The motion proposes shifting the Conclave's approach from passive regulation to an active governance model, indicating a need to update policy frameworks and operational procedures. The focus on changing regulatory methodology aligns with POLICY, while the procedural shift suggests PROC as a secondary pattern.

tasks.description: Investigate current Conclave regulatory frameworks and identify active regulation case studies from other governing bodies
tasks.notes: Focus on comparing passive vs active regulatory models and identifying measurable outcomes from proactive governance approaches

tasks.description: Develop a policy framework outlining procedures for proactive regulation, including trigger mechanisms and accountability protocols
tasks.notes: Must include transition guidelines from existing passive systems and risk mitigation strategies for implementation

tasks.description: Conduct structured consultations with Conclave members, industry representatives, and legal advisors on proposed active regulation protocols
tasks.notes: Prioritize feedback on conflict resolution mechanisms and resource allocation requirements for proactive oversight

tasks.description: Refine policy document based on stakeholder input and prepare for official adoption by the Conclave leadership
tasks.notes: Include implementation timelines, training requirements, and contingency plans for regulatory transition

blockers.description: The motion's title mentions shifting the Conclave's approach but lacks specific details on the new methodology, boundaries, or criteria for evaluating the shift. Ambiguous language creates uncertainty about the policy's implementation.
blockers.suggested_agenda_item: Define Scope and Parameters for Conclave's Policy Shift

blockers.description: The motion's lack of detail on stakeholder involvement or requirements could lead to competing interests among governance bodies, external entities, or community members. Conflicting priorities may hinder consensus.
blockers.suggested_agenda_item: Resolve Stakeholder Requirements for Policy Framework Update

blockers.description: The motion's proposal to shift the Conclave's approach may conflict with existing policies defining its role, enforcement mechanisms, or regulatory boundaries. Without explicit resolution, implementation risks legal or operational contradictions.
blockers.suggested_agenda_item: Address Policy Conflicts in Conclave's Regulatory Framework
